org.digidoc4j

Interface ValidationResult


  • public interface ValidationResult
    Validation result information. For BDOC the ValidationResult contains only information for the first signature of each signature XML file

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<DigiDoc4JException> getContainerErrors()
      Get list container related errors.

    • Method Detail

      • getErrors

        java.util.List<DigiDoc4JException> getErrors()
        Return a list of errors. DDOC returns all validation results as errors.
        Returns:
        list of errors

      • getWarnings

        java.util.List<DigiDoc4JException> getWarnings()
        Return a list of warnings. DDOC always returns an empty list.
        Returns:
        list of warnings

      • hasErrors

        boolean hasErrors()
        Are there any validation errors.
        Returns:
        value indicating if any errors exist

      • hasWarnings

        boolean hasWarnings()
        Are there any validation warnings. DDOC always returns false.
        Returns:
        value indicating if any warnings exist

      • isValid

        boolean isValid()
        Returns:
        true when document is valid

      • getReport

        java.lang.String getReport()
        Get validation report.
        Returns:
        report

      • getContainerErrors

        java.util.List<DigiDoc4JException> getContainerErrors()
        Get list container related errors. DDOC returns a list of errors encountered when validating meta data BDOC returns a list of errors encountered when opening the container
        Returns:
        List of exceptions
